02

VIDEOGRAPHY

kinetic storytelling and temporal aesthetics

STATUS
projects 12
discipline videography
status active
last_update jan_2025
philosophy_02

videography captures life in motion—documenting reality while crafting visual narratives through camera movement and composition.

each frame serves the story, building momentum and emotion through intentional cinematography and temporal pacing.
